text: Brevitrygon is a genus of stingrays in the family Dasyatidae from the Indo- Pacific. Its species were formerly contained within the genus Himantura. ==Species== * Brevitrygon heterura (Bleeker, 1852) * Brevitrygon imbricata (Bloch & Schneider, 1801) (Scaly whipray) * Brevitrygon javaensis (Last & White, 2013) * Brevitrygon walga (Müller & Henle, 1841) (Dwarf whipray) ==References== Category:Dasyatidae
title: Brevitrygon
